steps.heading: Step 01
steps.title: Order
steps.description: Select a card and add-ons. Complete the order process and payment.

steps.heading: Step 02
steps.title: Design
steps.description: Provide design input and upload your logo through the design portal.

steps.heading: Step 03
steps.title: Review
steps.description: Review the digital design proof and provide feedback.

steps.heading: Step 04
steps.title: Print & Ship
steps.description: After approval we will program, produce and ship your card.
